Text:
Pure awesome:
They won't associate with riff-raff non-scanners like me (and I don't blame them), but I know stuff. I hear things. I lurk outside the door. I bide my time. Someday they'll pay. Oh yesss, they'll pay! I could scan something, but that would be playing their game. I never play other people's games. I only play in my own imaginary world, where everyone loves me.
